about_the_game:
A story about the journey of Geranium, a female swordswoman with amnesia.
As the world's magic power dries up, strange occurrences are occurring all over the world.
It may also be related to the cause of her amnesia...


---------- Game System-----------------------


A platformer game where you discover various gimmicks and hidden rooms.

The game is a side-scrolling action RPG where you fight by combining normal attacks, strong attacks, sub-weapons, and magic attacks into combos.

The game is a side-scrolling action RPG where you fight with combos of normal attacks, strong attacks, sub-weapons and magic attacks.

You'll be able to create new weapons and items as you defeat enemies and drop materials.
